page.title: 08HOME ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Most people in the village have television and this is the most common form of home entertainment. Many people too, have video recorders which are used to record television programmes and replay them at a later date. Films are sometimes hired and these cost about Â£2. Many children in the village now have home computers. Younger children use them mainly for games but older children are able to write their own small programmes. Records and tapes are also a popular kind of home entertainment.A singer called Bruce Springsteen is well liked by many of the children in the school. Quite a lot of homes now have a snooker table and the game of snooker is quite popular.
